definition: A term commonly used to refer to a person who holds a special place in someone's heart due to their artistic abilities or creations. It typically denotes an individual who is highly admired or cherished by someone, often in the context of their preferred or favorite artist.

examples.german: Sie ist ein großer Fan ihres Lieblingskünstlers.
examples.english: She is a big fan of her favorite artist.

examples.german: Ich habe alle Alben meines Lieblingskünstlers.
examples.english: I have all the albums of my favorite artist.

examples.german: Er ist ein bekannter Lieblingskünstler in der Musikszene.
examples.english: He is a well-known favorite artist in the music scene.

examples.german: Mein Lieblingskünstler hat eine Ausstellung in der Galerie.
examples.english: My favorite artist has an exhibition at the gallery.
